name: Ghostly (Palantis)
description:
Have you ever wondered what happens when you go to sleep?
Well, wonder no more! Ghosts are attacking someone's slumber and its up to you to expel them.

Tap on ghosts to stop them. Simple as that.

Ghosts spawn in your bedroom and want to cuddle with your sleeping self.
Expel them before they get the chance!

Some ghosts make a ruckus in the kitchen. Expel them to prevent them from making too much noise.
